The newcomers are Set, Shuko, and co.

::Zardus::

Zardus raises an eyebrow at Hell Beast's responce.

"I was not aware of that," he says, looking down at his scanner, "I see..."

He turns to Liono. "Call back your men, Liono. You need them to defend your 
base."

"Dark One," Zardus says into his comm-link, "Spare the maximals for now. They 
need to return to their base."
